title: Invalid Server Certificate from Thunderbird
content: Following a recent update to Thunderbird, I lost connectivity to my email server. Here is the message from Thunderbird - "The certificate for pop.scdconline.org is not valid for that server." The current version of Thunderbird on my Windows 11 PC is 141.0 (2025072114:12:26). It was installed on 7/22/25 at 2:18:53PM. The last email I received through Thunderbird was on 7/23/25 at 6:18PM (EDT). I can still access the email account using webmail. Prior to this issue, I have been using Thunderbird for this email account since the first of this year with no issues. I'm out of idea, any suggestions?
creator: rgounaud

title: Kan geen mail versturen met mijn KPN account
content: Ik kan sinds dat ik een week geleden verhuisd ben geen mail meer versturen vanuit mijn KPN account. Ik heb niets gewijzigd in de instellingen. Ik krijg bij het verzenden de foutmelding "Verzenden van het bericht is mislukt. Er is een fout opgetreden bij het verzenden van e-mail. De mailserver antwoordde: Unable to relay without authentication. Controleer of uw e-mailadres juist is ingesteld in uw accountinstellingen en probeer het opnieuw." Ontvangen van mail gaat gelukkig nog wel goed. Weet u een oplossing want de instellingen van mijn uitgaande server staan goed volgens KPN? (Het verzenden lukt nog wel gewoon met mijn Google account trouwens).

title: Thunderbird pro Windows 8
content:
Kde, jak a lze vůbec získat instalaci Thunderbird pro Windows 8?

Thunderbird se přestal přihlašovat na imap.gmail.com, odesílat poštu šlo, i když hlásil nějakou chybu v autentikaci. Thunderbird hlásil, že je v aktuální verzi. Google poradil odinstalovat Thunderbird a udělat novou instalaci. Bohužel jsem až potom zjistil, že Mozilla už Windows 8 nepodporuje a verzi Thunderbird pro Win 8 nelze stáhnout. Dá se s tím něco udělat? Děkuji

title: Thunderbird; unable to sign in
content:
I am operating on a pc with windows 11. i have Thunderbird, v. 141. I know my email and password for jscottlee@prodigy.net works, but T-bird won't let me sign in, using the password.

I had used T-bird back in 2018, so there are about 1900 files in it, but that file number is not only limited in date to around 2018, but there are thousands more on my prodigy.net (ATT) server extending up to today and going back farther than 2018. I know the incoming imap.mail.yahoo.com, port 993 with encryption SSL/TLS entered into T-bird. I know the outgoing smtp.mail.yahoo.com pathway. T-bird, as far as I can see, does not ask for the outgoing port, 465. Encryption is the same as above.

When I try to sign in, I receive the "retry, enter new password" message. No luck in retrying or reentering.

I can access my email through my server and through Apple apps on other devices, but not on this computer through Thunderbird.

I've made sure Thunderbird is unblocked as an app in Windows security. I can't think of much else. Help please.
creator: jscottlee

title: Thunderbird email needs to be reset - not working on computer, but working on phone

title: ESR to Release: Why does TB 141 want a complete, new setup?
content:
MacOS 15.5. I’m running ver 128 ESR. I want to update to ver 141 Release.

I made certain that I have a backup of my current profile. Then I downloaded the 141 dmg and copied the application into a subfolder (called Internet) in /Applications, which is where verion 128 resides.

I opened version 141, and was presented with a window asking me to perform a complete, new setup. Why doesn’t version 141 find my (ver 128) default profile, which is named xxxxxx.default?

I quit version 141 without performing the Setup. There are no new files in my profile folder (and version 128 seems to be working normally).

Thank you.
creator: cursorsci
